ComicInfo.Title: Uncle Bert's Children; The Haunting of December Hill; Grandma's House; The Ghost Watch; Childhood Ghost
ComicInfo.Summary:
Uncle Bert's Children: Bert Franklin runs the carousel at an amusement park and claims it is his life...which it is.
The Haunting of December Hill: Mike tries to get into Boston society by faking his ancestry, but a ghost knows the real story.
Grandma's House: David gets a message from his grandma that saves his life.
The Ghost Watch: Tom dances the evening away with a ghost, while listening to her tale.
Childhood Ghost: While visiting a local haunted house, Paul and his friend discover that Ken killed a man with a well-thrown baseball many years ago.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-20 01:17:12. [CVDB186856] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 10:46:41. [Issue ID 575327]
